text:
This is an enhancement to the Ant 1.3 alpha baseline.  This code will allow
log4j users to log information to syslogd, when port 514 is either blocked,
closed, or not accessible.

The code has been tested on Linux, but will be tested on Solaris in the future,
as changes to build.xml have already been made.

Created attachment 10628
files that have created to support this functionality.  Unpack into org/apache/log4j directory
creator: log4jdev@schwebbman.com
